[![](https://i2.wp.com/static.flickr.com/38/85221522_b8f68ccd08.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/85221522/ "photo sharing") [Joe Who?](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/85221522/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Am I meant to know who this person is? A screamer woefully lacking in information.
